# jquery-ui

The [jQuery UI][2] [jQuery][4] plugin, packaged as a [Hoplon][1] dependency.

## Dependency

[Artifacts published on Clojars.][3]

## Usage

If you are going to use widgets you should add a jquery-ui theme to your project.
